sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a rectangle.
message_1: What is the perimeter of a rectangle with length of 12 cm and width of 7 cm?
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a rectangle, you can use the formula: Perimeter = 2(Length + Width). In this case, the length is 12 cm and the width is 7 cm.

Perimeter = 2(12 + 7) = 2(19) = 38 cm

The perimeter of the rectangle is 38 cm.
